title: WPL 2024: RCB Defeats Mumbai in a Thrilling Eliminator, Sets Up Final Clash With Delhi Capitals!
content:
Get ready for a nail-biting **WPL 2024 final**! **Royal Challengers Bangalore**  secured their place in the final after an incredible victory against the defending champions, **Mumbai Indians**, in a tense eliminator match. The match saw **Ellyse Perry** shine once again, delivering a stellar performance with both bat and ball, while **Asha Sobhana** emerged as a hero in the final over.  

The game was a real rollercoaster, with both teams controlling the game at different points. A crucial wicket of **Harmanpreet Kaur** proved to be the turning point for RCB, who then displayed impressive death bowling, showcasing their ability to handle pressure.

Now, RCB faces off against **Delhi Capitals** on Sunday, March 17th. Will RCB continue their winning streak, or will Delhi Capitals emerge victorious? Stay tuned for the **WPL 2024 final**!
author: Tanya Kini
